ALAWON
ISSN 1069-7799		      
Volume 12, Number 12 
  11 February 2003

American Library Association Washington Office Newsline
 

In this issue:  Museum and Library Services Act Action Needed

Please contact your Representative to sign on to H.R. 13, The Museum and Library Services Act of 2003. The House Education and the Workforce Committee plan to hold a mark-up on the bill on February 13, so co-sponsors can only be added up to February 12. A call now can demonstrate that there is great support for this bill and increased numbers will help make a great showing of support when the bill comes to the floor for a vote. Use the Capitol Switchboard at (202) 224-3121 to connect to your Member's office.

Attached is a list of the Representatives who have signed on to the bill.

H.R. 13: The Museum and Library Services Act of 2003

Mr. Hoekstra (for himself, Mr. Boehner, Mr. Castle, Mr. Greenwood, Mr. Ehlers, Mr. Isakson, Mrs. Biggert, Mr. Wilson of South Carolina, and Mr. English)
